bestApp.question: What is the best storytelling app for kids?
bestApp.answer: Fidjoo is one of the best storytelling apps for kids ages 5-12. Children create their own personalized animated storybooks by making simple choices: selecting a hero, a world, a challenge, and an ending. Each story becomes a unique animated video they can watch and share with family.

what.question: What is Fidjoo?
what.answer: Fidjoo is a creative app where children turn simple choices into their own animated storybooks, replacing passive screen time with meaningful, imaginative play. Kids build stories through guided choices and watch them come to life as beautiful animations.

safe.question: Is Fidjoo safe for children?
safe.answer: Yes, Fidjoo is 100% ad-free and built as a closed, kid-friendly environment. All creations stay private and fully supervised by parents. The app never records audio or video of children and follows strict privacy guidelines.

ages.question: What ages is Fidjoo designed for?
ages.answer: Fidjoo is ideal for children aged 5 to 12, with stories and experiences adapted to different reading and developmental levels. Younger children (5-7) benefit from parent participation, while older kids (8-12) can create independently.

offline.question: Does Fidjoo work offline?
offline.answer: Yes. Once a story is created, it can be enjoyed offline anytime. An internet connection is only needed for creating or customizing new stories. This makes Fidjoo perfect for travel, waiting rooms, or screen time without WiFi.

cost.question: How much does Fidjoo cost?
cost.answer: You can start for free with one story. Then, flexible subscriptions ($9.99/month) and credit packs ($7.99-$35.99) allow families to choose the option that fits them best. One animated story costs 3 credits.

bedtime.question: What is the best bedtime story app for kids?
bedtime.answer: Fidjoo is an excellent bedtime story app because children create their own stories through simple, calming choices. The animated storybooks are perfect for bedtime routines - kids feel accomplished having created something themselves, and parents can participate in the creative process together.

howCreate.question: How do kids create stories with Fidjoo?
howCreate.answer: Children build personalized animated storybooks by making guided choices. They pick a hero, select a world, choose a challenge, and decide the ending. Every choice transforms the narrative, teaching cause and effect while encouraging creativity and imagination.

article21.sub1p1: Fidjoo makes available to its Users an internal virtual currency, called FIDJ, allowing them to access certain paid features of the Service, in particular the generation of personalized stories.

article21.sub2intro: Users can choose between different credit packs or a monthly subscription, at the following rates:

article21.sub3p1: One story generation (personalized audio and/or video creation) consumes three (3) FIDJ.
article21.sub3p2: When a User initiates the generation of a story, the corresponding three FIDJ are temporarily reserved in an internal cache.

article21.sub3bullet1: If the story generation is successful, the FIDJ are permanently debited from the User's balance.
article21.sub3bullet2: On the other hand, if the generation fails for technical reasons beyond Fidjoo's control (server error, API problem, connection interruption, etc.), the FIDJ are not debited and are automatically restored to the User's account.
article21.sub3p3: Fidjoo makes every effort to ensure the reliability of the generation process, without however being able to guarantee uninterrupted availability or operation of the Service.
article21.sub4p1: FIDJ are valid as long as the User's Account remains active, subject to the expiration conditions described below.

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.p1: This page defines the terms of use for the voice system offered by Fidjoo exclusively for generating personalized audio stories (hereinafter the "Voice System").
section1.p2: These terms apply in addition to Fidjoo's <termsLink>General Terms of Use (GTU)</termsLink> and <privacyLink>Privacy Policy</privacyLink>.
section1.p3: In case of conflict, these specific terms prevail for everything concerning voice.

section2.title: 2. Voice System Description
section2.intro: The Voice System allows a parent user to:
section2.bullet1: voluntarily record audio content (adult voice only),
section2.bullet2: to enable the generation of personalized audio stories for their child,
section2.stepsIntro: The System works according to the following steps:
section2.step1: The user records an audio narration via the Fidjoo app.
section2.step2: This recording is processed securely and confidentially.
section2.step3: The voice is transmitted to a specialized third-party technical provider (Cartesia) solely for audio generation.
section2.step4: A final audio file is generated and returned to the user in the Fidjoo app.

section3.title: 3. Exclusive Purpose and Usage Limitation
section3.intro: The voice provided by the user:
section3.bullet1: is used solely for generating Fidjoo audio stories,
section3.bullet3: is never shared with other users,
section3.bullet4: is never used for commercial, advertising, or marketing purposes,
section3.bullet5: is never reused outside the strict context of Fidjoo stories.
section3.highlight: The voice cannot be used by the user for other services, nor exported, nor reused outside Fidjoo.

section4.title: 4. Confidentiality and Security
section4.intro: Fidjoo applies strict technical and organizational measures to ensure:
section4.bullet2: access strictly limited to only necessary systems,
section4.bullet3: secure storage on servers located in Europe,
section4.bullet4: no disclosure or access by unauthorized third parties.
section4.highlight: No other user can see, hear, or access another user's voice.

section5.title: 5. Third-Party Provider: Cartesia
section5.p1: For the technical needs of audio generation, Fidjoo uses the provider Cartesia.
section5.bullet1: the voice is transmitted solely for the technical execution of the service,
section5.bullet2: Cartesia acts as a subcontractor within the meaning of GDPR,
section5.bullet3: Cartesia is not authorized to reuse the voice for its own purposes.
section5.linkText: Cartesia's terms of use are available here:

section6.title: 6. Voice Data Retention
section6.principleDesc: Fidjoo does not retain any voice beyond what is strictly necessary.
section6.bullet1: Voice recordings are not permanently stored.
section6.bullet2: Once the voice is deleted, no usable trace is retained by Fidjoo.

section7.title: 7. Voice Deletion (Right to Erasure)
section7.intro: The user can delete their voice at any time, without justification:
section7.deletionBullet1: The voice is deleted from Fidjoo systems.
section7.deletionBullet3: The voice is also deleted from Cartesia.
section7.deletionBullet4: No copy is retained by Fidjoo or its providers.
section7.highlight: This deletion is final and irreversible.
